revised_title: Star-Fish Development: Comatula and Pentacrinus Europaeus
tldr: The author, John V. Thompson, demonstrates that the Pentacrinus Europaeus, a stationary marine creature, is the evolved form of the Comatula starfish. The Pentacrinus Europaeus starts as an egg from the Comatula, detaches, and develops into a mobile creature capable of swimming in the ocean.
